name: Lundum Dare 41
description:
My First ever game jam and “Finished” game

All sounds, models, programming were done from scratch during the 48, no free assets or code base was used.

WASD to Move

Mouse to rotate Camera

Scrollwheel to move Spawn Point

1 to spawn Platform

2 to spawn Launcher

3 to spawn Turret

M to mute music

Touch the Gold Square to win

Only did testing for Windows don’t know if Linux works. I recommend doing the download vs HTML, mouse controls and sound looping don’t work well in the browser.
